oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alabama, Selma, Marion, Memphis Railroad Company bonds, signed by N. B. Forrest, president of the railroad
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: State of Alabama, Selma, Marion, Memphis Railroad Company bonds. Issued September 1, 1869. Reverse side includes original signature of Nathan Bedford Forrest, President. Bond is numbered 67, amount $1,000. Payable in "gold coin of the United States" .and "Guaranteed by the State of Alabama."
